html:
2026-0109
2026-02-05CEIC, ESDCEmployment Insurance ActRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations in order to (1) amend and remove inconsistent provisions while preserving the intent of the legislative and regulatory Employment Insurance regime; and (2) ensure that income supports received through the Worker Retention Grant for Work-Sharing Employers do not result in a dollar-for-dollar deduction in EI Work-Sharing benefits.Registration: SOR/2026-0018 Publication Date: 2026-02-25
subject: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations in order to (1) amend and remove inconsistent provisions while preserving the intent of the legislative and regulatory Employment Insurance regime; and (2) ensure that income supports received through the Worker Retention Grant for Work-Sharing Employers do not result in a dollar-for-dollar deduction in EI Work-Sharing benefits.
